datalist.name: None
datalist.message: Invalid Dialog.

datalist.name: LoginTimeOut
datalist.title: Time's Up
datalist.message: Returning to title screen.

datalist.name: NetworkErrorToComBattle
datalist.message:
Due to a network error,
the game will switch to COM Battle.

datalist.name: NoMatchingToComBattle
datalist.message:
Because an opponent could not be found,
the game will switch to COM Battle.

datalist.name: CardSetChange
datalist.title: Changes not saved
datalist.message:
Changes will not be saved.
Is that OK?

datalist.name: PartyChange
datalist.title: Changes not saved
datalist.message:
Changes will not be saved.
Is that OK?

datalist.name: Logout
datalist.message:
Are you sure you want to log out?
※Remaining CP will be converted to Summoning Tickets.

datalist.name: ForcedBattle
datalist.title: Timed Out
datalist.message:
Spend 100CP to start
a Net Battle Match.

datalist.name: MatchingNational
datalist.message:
Spend 100CP to start
a Net Battle Match.

datalist.name: TimeoutToTitle
datalist.title: Timed Out
datalist.message: Returning to title screen.

datalist.name: MobilephoneInfo
datalist.title: Cell Phone Usage Notice
datalist.message:
電話機の紛失、故障などのトラブルについて、
設置店舗ならびにセガは一切の責任を負いかねます。
電話機の状態により、カードリーダーが認識しない場合があります。
プレイデータの管理には、電話機に内蔵されたICチップの
製造番号のみを利用します。
※携帯電話以外でこの画面が出た場合は、いいえを選択してください。

Aimeの登録を行うことで、データを保存できます。
登録を行うと、別のAimeのデータが移行できなくなります。
データの移行先として使用する場合、Aimeゲームサイトへの登録が必要です。
登録に必要なアクセスコードはアクセスコードの確認からご確認ください。
※データ移行の操作は、Aimeサービスサイトをご参照ください。

datalist.name: AimeInfo
datalist.title: Aime Data Confirmation
datalist.message:
Aime Registration allows you to save data.

Once registered, data from another Aime cannot be transferred.
If you wish to transfer data, you must register this card on the Aime website.
Please check the back of your card for the Access Code.
※Please Refer to the Aime Website for more information.

datalist.name: NewRegist
datalist.title: New Registration Confirmation
datalist.message:
There is no play data on this Aime.
Aime Registration allows you to save data.

Register this Aime and start playing?

datalist.name: GameStart
datalist.title: Starting Game
datalist.message:
Start the game
using 1 credit.

datalist.name: GuestLogout
datalist.message:
Are you sure you want to log out?
※Remaining CP will be converted to Summoning Tickets.

datalist.name: GuestLogin
datalist.title: Guest Play Confirmation
datalist.message:
Starting guest play.
Data saving and new cards are unavailable
as no Aime is being used.

datalist.name: Close
datalist.title: Closing Time
datalist.message:
This cabinet is now closed as
it is closing time.

datalist.name: NoProduct
datalist.title: Log Out
datalist.message:
Logging Out as no more
can be summoned.

datalist.name: PlaceEventOpened
datalist.message:
Chrono Regalia play is unavailable.

New registration is unavailable
due to an in-store event.

datalist.name: TerminalNewAime
datalist.message:
Chrono Regalia play is unavailable.

Please register at a satellite、
and create player data.

datalist.name: UnderVersion
datalist.message:
Player data is newer
than this cabinet and
login is unavailable.

datalist.name: UpperVersionTerminal
datalist.message:
If you do not have the latest version of player data,
you will not be able to use the terminal.
Please update your player data
by logging in at a satellite.

datalist.name: UpperVersionSatellite
datalist.message:
Data update to the latest version is required.
Do you want to update your data?

<#ff0046>※If you select yes, you will be unable
to play the older version.。</color>

datalist.name: ForceTerminationNoLogin
datalist.title: Closing Time
datalist.message:
This cabinet is now closed as
it is closing time.

datalist.name: NoPersonalReplay
datalist.title: Log Out
datalist.message:
No replay data is available and
you will be logged out.

datalist.name: RestoreCP
datalist.message:
Unused CP have been
retained as log out was
unsuccessful last play.

datalist.name: InvalidCard
datalist.title: Card Ineligable
datalist.message:
There are cards in this deck that are too old.

Cards have been replaced.

datalist.name: ForbidCardReplay
datalist.title: Unplayable
datalist.message:
Replay cannot be played as one or
more banned cards have been used.

datalist.name: NetworkError
datalist.message:
Network error has occured.
Returning to title screen.
If you have unused CP,
relogin at this cabinet to claim them.

datalist.name: LoadFailAime
datalist.message:
Aime could not be read.
Please check and scan your card again.

datalist.name: InvalidAime
datalist.message: Unavailable to due invalid card

datalist.name: DuplicationLogin
datalist.message:
This Aime is already being used on another cabinet.
Please check and scan your card again.

datalist.name: NetworkErrorAimeAdvertise
datalist.message:
Aime communication error occurred.
Please check and scan your card again.
